text: is a Japanese voice actor and singer who works for Ken Production. His wife is his fellow voice actress Yuka Nishigaki. On November 13, 2019, Yonaga announced that he will be limiting his work as he was diagnosed with Dysphonia in 2018.https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-11-18/voice-actor-tsubasa- yonaga-limits-his-work-due-to-dysphonia/.153403 ==Filmography == ===Animation=== ;2007 *Gigantic Formula (Shingo Suwa) *Ookiku Furikabutte (Ren Mihashi) *Wangan Midnight (Harada) ;2008 *Bamboo Blade (Fujimura) *Bleach (Shū Kannogi) *Chaos;Head (Shogun) *Persona: Trinity Soul (Shiiba and Wakaba) *S · A: Special A (Jun Yamamoto) *Shugo Chara!
